summary: A convict falls in love with his new cellmate's sister, only to become embroiled in a planned break-out which is certain to have lethal consequences.
cast: Chester Morris|Wallace Beery|Lewis Stone|Robert Montgomery|Leila Hyams|George F. Marion|J.C. Nugent|Karl Dane|DeWitt Jennings|Matthew Betz|Claire McDowell|Robert Emmett O'Connor|Tom Kennedy|Tom Wilson|Eddie Foyer|Roscoe Ates|Fletcher Norton|Edgar Dearing|Ethan Laidlaw|Eddie Lambert|George Magrill|Chris-Pin Martin|Louis Natheaux|Charles O'Malley|Herbert Prior|Angelo Rossitto|Adolph Seidel|Michael Vavitch|Harry Wilson
director: Directors: George W. Hill (as George Hill), Ward Wing (uncredited)
title: El presidio
